verbose_text: The increased protein amounts of Col2 and sGAG in pellet cultures after incubation with TGF-beta1 or the combination of TGF-beta1 and IGF-1 were in relation to enhanced TGFBR1 expression of the different donors, supposing the possibility to derive the responsiveness to TGF-beta1 and/or IGF-1 from the increase in mRNA levels of the corresponding receptors.
